website_summaries.verdict: The table's narrow base gives it a small footprint for its size.
pros: The curved supports give this table a look like no other
We love the sleek glass surface and the narrow base

customer_reviews.title: This table is beautiful, was so well packed it took longer to ...
customer_reviews.text: This table is beautiful, was so well packed it took longer to remove the packing than it did putting together. No chips or scratches. Looks great in my living room. I love the champagne/platinum color of the "legs" matches well with the other items I have of similar tone. Would highly recommend it and it perfect for cocktails with plenty of room for glasses and small plates.
customer_reviews.author: mary from Naples

customer_reviews.title: The glass arrived in dangerously small and shattered pieces that could easily spill out of the box onto our carpet with ...
customer_reviews.text: We were very excited to receive this coffee table, but I am now reading that I have had a similar experience to several buyers. The glass arrived in dangerously small and shattered pieces that could easily spill out of the box onto our carpet with a small toddler in the home. The glass was shattered into millions of pieces. It has been two months and the seller will not respond with a proper response other than, "more information is needed." We have matching furniture pieces to this set and have been waiting and waiting to resolve the issue and get our coffee table. So frustrating. Absolutely my worst experience through Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Glendinning

customer_reviews.title: Defected Product
customer_reviews.text: Very bad experience and unhappy with the result. Bought this coffee table and matched end table. Received defected coffee table and multiple replacements were also defected. Waste a lot of time to detail with Amazon and supply. And we missed time window to return the matched end table although we checked with Amazon customer phone service rep and always promised end table could be returned if coffee table does not work out. Lesson learned, next time will return everything if purchase more than one piece regardless good or bad.
customer_reviews.author: Ruo Fei Peng

customer_reviews.title: I like the glass coffee table but the Base came with ...
customer_reviews.text: I like the glass coffee table but the Base came with nicks and marks So I contacted the seller they wanted pics Etc.. so I wasent going through that hassle So I just took a permanent black marker and Filled them in ..so if your asking would I buy again NO hope this review helps
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the money
customer_reviews.text: This table is beautiful--it looks like it cost much more than it did. It's very stable. The only reason I didn't give it 5 stars is that the screw holes were drilled slightly off of where they should have been, and it took two of us pushing on it to get the holes lined up correctly.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Ondrejka

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic table and design very contemporary
customer_reviews.text: This table is very high-quality very heavy glass and the structure is sufficient to hold contemporary design you will love it
customer_reviews.author: john f. richnavsky

customer_reviews.title: Wrapped absolutely perfect 3. Massive man approved by husband (meaning glass ...
customer_reviews.text: 6 things: 1. Came much sooner 2. Wrapped absolutely perfect 3. Massive man approved by husband (meaning glass is very thick) 4. Very easy to put together 5. Seller was dedicated to keeping in contact 6. LOOKS AMAZING
customer_reviews.author: Tyzzz

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality / returns
customer_reviews.text: Glass and base screws did not align and were too far apart to correct. UPS return pick up did not go well as driver had only one label for two boxes so I had to take extra box to UPS store. Unknown how refund will occur.
customer_reviews.author: Deanna

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Quality of the metal glass holders bad. Beware, 2 tablel tops came broken off.
customer_reviews.author: Eduard L.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I was worried about ordering this coffee table, because I didn't get to see it first. However, I really liked the look on-line so I decided to give it a try. The quality is better than I expected and it looks great in the living room.
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful coffee table. Exactly like the picture. Very good quality and will last for a long time. I am thrilled that I can purchase furniture sight unseen online and have be a great purchase for a great price!!
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne

customer_reviews.title: Love This Table
customer_reviews.text: We love this table. It was very easy to assemble. I would say it took about 20 minutes to put together. Everything matched up when we put it together and it has a very high quality look and feel. I assume the other review doesn't know the top from the bottom. We purchased this with the end table and it looks amazing! Our home is very modern and high end and this item fit right in with furniture much more expensive. A great deal for the price. It is heavy and large, so shipping is reasonable for the size of the item.
customer_reviews.author: Abstract

customer_reviews.title: THE PRODUCT ARRIVED INCOMPLETE
customer_reviews.text: THE PRODUCT ARRIVED INCOMPLETE, MISSING THE BASE OF THE TABLE, THAT IS, THE MOST IMPORTANT PART OF THE TABLE, EVEN IF I WAS NOT PERMITED A REPLACEMENT OF THE PRODUCT.
customer_reviews.author: Martina T.

customer_reviews.title: Customer Service Outstanding
customer_reviews.text: Received my table on time and most securely packed. Would have given it a five rating but think the glass is not as thick as I would have liked it to be. However it is a very attractive table and it was easily put together. I cannot complete this review without including the fabulous customer service I received from Ola at Furniture Creations. She was knowledgable, helpful and went over and beyond what a competent customer service representative would have done. Iwill recommend Furniture Creations to my friends and will certainly use them again.
customer_reviews.author: GiGi

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I really like this table it fits perfectly in my den.
customer_reviews.author: Calgal

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It looks nice, easy to put together. But gets scratched easily.
customer_reviews.author: Abbie

customer_reviews.title: It's beautiful and inexpensive too
customer_reviews.text: It's beautiful and inexpensive too! Set it up in about 20 minutes, heavy but packaged well to avoid any damage. Highly recommend this modern, graceful table.
customer_reviews.author: Groovekids

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: looks beautiful! a little hard to keep clean and free of fingerprints
customer_reviews.author: Randy Hicks

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The glass was broken when they delivered so I returned it for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Shahab

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful coffee table!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this coffee table. It is good quality, the glass is beautiful, a wonderful addition to my contemporary decor.
customer_reviews.author: JL2500

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: La mesa me encantó llego en excelente condición y sin ningún defectó, gracias quede muy complasida.
customer_reviews.author: wilson c.

customer_reviews.title: Third time's a charm...
customer_reviews.text: We love the table. I gave it 4 stars because it took 3 deliveries to get it right. The first table top was completely shattered. The second table top was in one piece but the two silver disks were not permanently affixed to mount the top to the stand. The third table top was perfect...This table was a housewarming gift and is now being enjoyed, is functional and looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Barb Bruckner

customer_reviews.title: ... 3 to include the end tables and I simply love
customer_reviews.text: I bought all 3 to include the end tables and I simply love it
customer_reviews.author: jennifer p.morgan

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Received in about a week, but the base had a damaged corner. Emailed them and got a new base in 3 days. Really excellent seller ( Home & Living inc.). Table is very easy to assemble and feels really solid (unlike my previous table that cost me right around the same price). And lastly, this table just looks really nice in a modern condo.
customer_reviews.author: Jasm7

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Better than expected. Very well built. Easy to assemble. Very nice design.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Williams

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Would have been to big for my house I think, Did not receive it here
customer_reviews.author: Trinka Y.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: great buy love make your home looks rich and elegant
customer_reviews.author: Desta Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Pros: great looking, easy to assemble, good value for money Cons: just not enough heft for my particular needs; the glass is just average quality and thickness. Not bad for price range however, and certainly adequate; I'll be selling this shortly and getting one with at least 1/2 inch thickness glass.
customer_reviews.author: Bill N

customer_reviews.title: COFFEE TABLE -- COASTER 701238
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with the table I have bought. Looks very good, the price is very good. I t was delivered fast and packaged wery well, so no damage there. I t was easy and fast to assemble the table. I would recomend to buy this table.
customer_reviews.author: Tatyana Chicherova

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very attractive and also very sturdy and strong. I would highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Fontas

customer_reviews.title: ... to the base properly but the table is very nice!
customer_reviews.text: The legs doesn't screw on to the base properly but the table is very nice!
customer_reviews.author: Jima Cor

customer_reviews.title: Broken glass on delivery
customer_reviews.text: We really wanted to like this table but it arrived with broken glass, twice. so, we just gave up! Too bad...
customer_reviews.author: dk reviews

customer_reviews.title: Glass arrived cracked and Furniture Creations would not replace. Don't buy!
customer_reviews.text: Glass top arrived cracked. Furniture Creations could not resolve in 2 1/2 weeks. I had to return at my expense.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia E Davis

customer_reviews.title: Georgous
customer_reviews.text: Did I spenn that correctly. The table is beautiful.............and it arrived packed like crazy. That is the only thing I can say. It was packed three times and it took me (a little ole lady) for EVER to unpack it.....but that was good because it was in perfect conditon with not a scratch on it. They knew what they were doing. I am very happy with it, so much so that I bought the end table and talked about that in another review. I recommend it. It is very rich looking and goes well with my white leather love seats and white leather side chairs.
customer_reviews.author: JayneNashville

customer_reviews.title: It looks beatifull. However, thickness of glass is ...
customer_reviews.text: It looks beatifull. However, thickness of glass is very thin.
customer_reviews.author: ramesh Gandhi

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE IT. The tables give the living room an elegant look and feel. Upon receipt, i thought the sofa table was too tall. but it works out great in front of the window.
customer_reviews.author: Daveda's Fire 8HD

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!!!
customer_reviews.text: Looks marvelous! very easy to assemble. doesn't look heavy at all. good quality glass and stand. I do recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Irene N

customer_reviews.title: Dangerously Shattered  Glass
customer_reviews.text: We really like this table but it happened. Here is the story: My wife and I spent hours on the weekend to open the 2 boxes of the order, and cleanup the dangerous pieces of glass that poured out from a just open small corner of one box. We immediately contacted Amazon and was arranged for a return pickup, according to local regulations as my city; perhaps state of MA requires disposing hazardous materials, with fees at special disposal centers. It is a huge safety issue and inconvenience that as a US consumer we feel we should not be subjected to.
customer_reviews.author: MydaViet

customer_reviews.title: Very elegant and modern table for a very good reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: You cannot beat that price for what you get. Very elegant and modern table for a very good reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Lowinsky

customer_reviews.title: Beware of who you are buying it from
customer_reviews.text: The table top delivered were shattered tiny pieces of glass inside the packaging box.. I have places the order before Thanksgivings. It's has been two month since I placed this order with Moshya Home Furnishings - Amazon Marketplace. I am currently fighting for a refund since the promised replacement table top never arrived. It is a buyer's nightmare.
customer_reviews.author: Happy

customer_reviews.title: Loved my product
customer_reviews.text: Loved my product! Unfortunately one of the end tables had a tiny chip in the corner but I didn't want to go through re packing and sending back
customer_reviews.author: Armine

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Would have given 4 stars if not for the problems we experienced
customer_reviews.author: LANNY ENGLISH

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Just beautiful and easily assembled. I am a 76 year old woman and did it myself.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley B. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THE COFFEE TABLE, BUT...
customer_reviews.text: The coffee table is great. Looks like the picture, fits our room and looks nice. We also ordered the end table and sofa table and were not pleased with either one of them. Coaster doesn't seem to have their act together in doing quality work and we were disappointed with the other two items. We got lucky with the coffee table. On the other two items, the glass top did not line up with the base, so everything was off and not in alignment. I would not order from this company again because for what we paid, the workmanship should have been much better. I just have to tell our guests to take off their glasses before entering the room!
customer_reviews.author: marlene lorea

customer_reviews.title: The table is great, looks amazing
customer_reviews.text: The table is great, looks amazing. Shipped fast, no defects, very well packed and easy to assemble. I would recommend it for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Orlando

customer_reviews.title: Very nice, Good quality glass coffee table
customer_reviews.text: Shipped very fast. Interesting we got the shipping notice after next day the package already arrive. Package was well packed. The coffee table looked very nice good quality. The look and quality could compete with some local expensive furniture store with much high price.
customer_reviews.author: JJX

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is beautiful n elegant coffee table!! It was much better than I expected^^
customer_reviews.author: joon hong

customer_reviews.title: ok
customer_reviews.text: Just got my package. I am very happy with the product. The only negative thing is that i got charged 52$ more. The table was 310$ and they charged me 362$
customer_reviews.author: Slavi

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Better than expected. Easy to assemble, looked great in our room. Only improvement a thicker glass and variable sizes to chose from.
customer_reviews.author: Arthur A Baribeault

customer_reviews.title: Just as pictured.
customer_reviews.text: It arrives in 2 packages; the glass top separate from the rest. Extremely well packed so nothing was damaged. I'm a retired woman and had no trouble putting it together myself. It looks exactly like the picture. Although it is modern in design I have it in a room with a mixture of contemporary and traditional furniture and it looks great. I have already received many compliments on it.
customer_reviews.author: BBP from NY

customer_reviews.title: GORGEOUS
customer_reviews.text: Soon as i saw this i said WOW...it is very stylish and different..did not question whether i liked it or not or whether it would go with my decor..it does..i have a black leather couch, and i put a thin zebra rug under this table...which goes along with zebra chair in far corner...it really comes together...this table is very sturdy, heavy, but can slide and reposition easily..the glass top is thich and tempered and beveleved edge..great purchase!!
customer_reviews.author: kevina

customer_reviews.title: High quality and great looking!
customer_reviews.text: I both the 3-piece set shown on the picture (coffee, side and sofa tables) and the set looks great. My house has very expensive furniture and this set at a great price fits perfectly with the much more expensive furniture around the house. I think it is a great buy, excellent quality, and top notch looks. Can't beat that!
customer_reviews.author: Happy Retiree

product_meta.title: Shearwater Rectangular Coffee Table Silver and Clear
product_meta.description: Infuse your home with sleek style and contemporary appeal. This stunning coffee table marries a classy, curvy support with a clean, crisp square base and rectangular top. Constructed from metal, its support is finished in shiny, satiny silver for a pleasing hint of polish. Its floating glass top exudes graceful glamour. Balanced out by a bold, high-sheen black base, this table is the epitome of modern elegance.
feature_bullets: Food finish: Metal support with a high sheen black base
Type of glass: Floating glass top

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.7 out of 5 stars89 ratings3.7 out of 5 stars
